subject: Haunted Home Blog
author: eastern_paranormal
full_text:
Good Morning,

Eastern Paranormal has a "Haunted Home Blog," that I post activity in 
my home. We started it to help other haunted home owners learn how to 
document their activity as well. I have some EVP's and photo's posted 
there as well as activity logs. Here is the link:

http://hauntedhomeblog.easternparanormal.com/

Have A Great New Year Everyone!

Gabreael
www.easternparanormal.com
